review: I returned the Fire Stick to the store and replaced it with a Roku stick. The Fire stick plug made a poor,  loose connection with the TV. Only by delicate repositioning at each attempt to use it, was I able to register the device and watch one show (Netflix), one time. Although present in the list of contents, there was no HDMI extender in the box. I think the extender would have helped.  The power cable, hanging off the top, tended to tilt and disconnect the fire stick. When I tried to exchange the Fire Stick, Best Buy was temporarily out them. I would have had to upgrade to Fire TV. I opted instead to return the Fire Stick and purchase a Roku stick. The Roku stick made and has continued to make a much better connection with the TV.
